committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Forests, and Mining

official_title: A bill to adjust the boundary of the Carson National Forest, New Mexico.
short_title: Carson National Forest Boundary Adjustment Act of 2013

summary.text: Carson National Forest Boundary Adjustment Act of 2013 - Adjusts the boundary of the Carson National Forest in New Mexico to incorporate approximately 4,990 acres of land identified as the Miranda Canyon Boundary.

titles.title: Carson National Forest Boundary Adjustment Act of 2013
Carson National Forest Boundary Adjustment Act of 2013
A bill to adjust the boundary of the Carson National Forest, New Mexico.
